channel.title: Clicking/rearranging/adding buttons/tabs, - Basic Client help
channel.description:
Basically what I need to know is how to change the placement of, adding new, and re-configuring buttons within a client. I found out that most of the client modifications are within the cache, not the client file, but can't figure how to configure them :\...
What I need/would like to change/modify about the client I dowloaded:
1.) Change "Log-out" tab from a sign? To the actual door.
2.) Add the "Reset Xp" option to xp counter.
3.) How to Remove what is currently in quest tab for "click commands" such as - "open Items kept on death; open quick chat; xp lock [enabled]; ETC." and how to change them to what I wish for them to be such as "teleports; staff online; skill teleports; ETC"
4.) (What everyone has/wants) How to add a fully functional Money Pouch - in the correct spot.
5.) How to add fully functional and working curses.
6.) How to change the "oldschool" skill icons to the newer versions.
If you can be of any help, I would HIGHLY appreciate it! Thanks so much!

item.title: Clicking/rearranging/adding buttons/tabs, - Basic Client help
item.dc:creator: @solias2500 solias2500
item.description:
@solias2500 wrote:

Basically what I need to know is how to change the placement of, adding new, and re-configuring buttons within a client.
I found out that most of the client modifications are within the cache, not the client file, but can’t figure how to configure them :…

What I need/would like to change/modify about the client I dowloaded:

1.) Change “Log-out” tab from a sign? To the actual door.

2.) Add the “Reset Xp” option to xp counter.

3.) How to Remove what is currently in quest tab for “click commands” such as - “open Items kept on death; open quick chat; xp lock [enabled]; ETC.” and how to change them to what I wish for them to be such as “teleports; staff online; skill teleports; ETC”

4.) (What everyone has/wants) How to add a fully functional Money Pouch - in the correct spot.

5.) How to add fully functional and working curses.

6.) How to change the “oldschool” skill icons to the newer versions.

If you can be of any help, I would HIGHLY appreciate it! Thanks so much!
